title: Decommissioning in Ozone summary: Formal process to shut down machines in a safe way after the required replications. date: 2019-07-31 jira: HDDS-1881 status: current author: Anu Engineer, Marton Elek, Stephen O’Donnell Abstract The goal of decommissioning is to turn off a selected set of machines without data loss.
